details.sectionContent: Entertain your mind and develop the skill.
This is an entertaining event whick will also provide an opportunuty to develop your inner talent. After developing your mind, to the next level it totally depend upon your hidden skill
The Quiz will be conducted. Quiz based on simple logo’s, tagline’s, Brands, Bikes specification, music (ad, songs), dialogues
In this round participants are required to make a video based on given products like (Advertisements, Brands, taglines, lm act). This video have to be promotional type.

This is the final round of survival in the game which shows how perfect you are in bargaining and promotion skill.In this round you have to sell a product given by us in the max price you want and the max price dealing with the product is a winner.
